description: A yarn script entry is created to run this script
steps: An entry under 'scripts' in the root package.json file gets created to run the generated script
The script can find the dynamic-plugins.yaml file in this directory

description: Find the latest release version in this repository
steps: The script can find the value of the latest release in the root package.json file in 'version'
The script can update any literal 'release-x.y' values in the dynamic-plugins.yaml file
The script uses the latest release version to update these values to the correct release version
The changes are persisted to the dynamic-plugins file

description: The registry values can be optionally updated
steps: The script can update any literal '<registry>' values in the dynamic-plugins.yaml file
The script uses an optional flag and value to do the update
The changes are persisted to the dynamic-plugins file

description: The username values can be optionally updated
steps: The script can update any literal '<username>' values in the dynamic-plugins.yaml file
The script uses an optional flag and value to do the update
The changes are persisted to the dynamic-plugins file

description: The repository values can be optionally updated
steps: The script can update any literal '<repository>' values in the dynamic-plugins.yaml file
The script uses an optional flag and value to do the update
